description:
Large 2-bedroom/1.5-bath condo on 19th & Spring Garden St.
This condo was completely rehabbed and offers an open concept kitchen, dining area, and living room (loft feel w/ exposed central air ducts). Located around the corner from Target, Whole Foods, PSC, restaurants, bars, and museums.

title: Why Rent When You Can OWN?
description:

title: Vibrant 1 bed 1 bath bi-level apt in Fairmount with C/A & more!
description:
2025 Cambridge St #D – Now available!
Located in the heart of the Art Museum/Fairmount section of Philadelphia you have easy access to all points of the city. Being walking distance from world famous art museums like the Barnes foundation, you can easily take in plenty of culture. If you’re looking for a scenic route for exercising, run down to the Kelly Drive towpath and get in your miles. This location has so much to offer!

We are in our late 30s and quiet, reliable tenants and we do not smoke anything. We do not have animals, but we are animal lovers, and we love nature.
I am a teacher at a German school and my husband works in interior design.
We are looking from November 1st, but we can also imagine a later move-in date.
I'm Kelly a kind long term sober (20+ years) human seeking a beautiful well appointed long term cottage or in-law / granny unit / apt. or living situation in the Larkspsur / Tiburon / Sausalito / Terra Linda / Corte Madera / Mill Valley / San Anselmo area. Prefer partial rent /work exchange where I could also house sit for you; or feed your horse or walk your dog, or run errands, or look after an elder, or child or cat or be your assistant or some type of creative exchange like that as a partial payment of rent. My budget is $1800 per month.
Ideally seeking place surrounded by trees; accessible walking / hiking trails; has swimming pool access or a community pool nearby; secure garage parking; and at least half mile or more away from freeways;
Desired features and elements:
1) dishwasher
2) in unit washer/ dryer
3) secure enclosed garage for auto parking / electric vehicle plug in
4) quiet low traffic street and neighborhood
5) long bathtub ( claw foot style, perhaps?)
6) excellent water pressure on all faucets / shower/ bath
7) updated bathroom / kitchen fixtures
8) modern late-model hot water heater
9) hardwood floors
10) central heating and a/c
11) updated and fully operational smoke detectors and carbon monoxide detectors
12) swimming pool or community pool nearby
13) walkable to shops/ restaurants / grocery stores / yoga studios/ gyms
14) plot or space to garden and to grow food and / or flowers
15) within 5 miles of horse stables / riding lessons
Hello my name is Jacob and I am looking for a private bedroom to rent in the city. I just moved here two months ago from New Orleans. I’ve been staying with my girlfriend but we are splitting up. I’m a fun outgoing guy who enjoys his whiskey, 420, finding awesome taco trucks, art, music, music, music, laughing, documentaries. I’m 43 years old. Got a lot of tattoos. I work as a professional chef and cook at home but not much. When I do cook I clean up. I am a very neat, clean and orderly person when it comes to my bedroom and common spaces. I do not have any pets, no drama, no BS. Just a down to earth fun outgoing guy that keeps to himself for the most part. I’m cool with all animals and have no allergies. I don’t need much just hoping to find a bedroom that is furnished. I don’t want to spend more than $1,300.00 but am a bit flexible. Feel free to text me with your spot and details.
Hello, I am your newest tenant and have great references to share with you too! I am a young, single, hard-working lady in my 20s with no pets looking for a new place to live. I’m very responsible, clean, quiet and respectful. I don’t party and spend most of my time just working. I am born and raised in Santa Cruz County and love this area. I have family and my work close by and so am trying to stay local.
I work full time, Monday-Friday + some weekends outside of the house (not work-from-home) helping to direct traffic for a traffic control company. I have been working there for two years and have a stable union employment.
I will treat your property like my HOME with such care!
I have good rental history and great REFERENCES.
PREFERENCES-
I’m looking for the following:
•Within 10-20 miles of Watsonville away from town. (Aromas, Prunedale, Corralitos, Royal Oaks etc)
•One bedroom, Granny unit, in-law, stand alone or more etc.
•500+ square feet
•Full kitchen
•Washer/dryer in the unit would be nice but not deal breaker
•$1,600 budget give or take (including utilities)
•No roommates/housemates
Hi there
I'm looking for a place to park and sleep from 10pm to 6am. I work approximately 16 hours a day and need a place that's safe with no loud music.
I have a 2017 tacoma with a shell on the back and it's set up to sleep comfortably. I will probably need it for 2 months maybe more but hopefully not.
I don't drink or smoke and very trustworthy.
Thanks and have a great day 😀
Hi there! I'm seeking to be of mutual aide via a caregiving/living space trade or partial trade. I cannot for the life of me get craigslist to correct my pic - it's vertical in my files so I'm confused. I figure it's better you see me, with your head cocked like an owl, than not...
I do work 30 hours a week caregiving in Lincoln Heights, and have time around that to offer. I'm in my mid 40's, have been in the Bay Area for twenty years, and my first career was in social justice inside mental health initiatives. I decided that more simpler work that allows me to do art is a better fit. I have 4 years of caregiving experience - mobility assistance, cooking, med prompting, and light housekeeping. I LOVE to cook for folks, and provide activities that give more involvement. I garden. I'm handy with tech. I have good references. I have my own car and am vaccinated and boosted and careful with exposure. I don't have animals, but I do love them. The context of this request is that having transitioned to a less lucrative career since the pandemic, staying in the East Bay is hard without a situation like this, and secondly, I've been in a healthy, warm space in Richmond which is now undergoing an unexpected and onerous construction project and being at home is no longer enjoyable. I would look forward to a conversation with you about how we might help each other. I'm easy to find on LinkedIn if you want to look at that, also - it reflects my previous career.
We're a family (4 members) living in this house. We currently have one room available now. We're looking for someone (single ) who needs a small place to stay for study or work. It's a small room with 10' X 10' (10 Sq. Ft) and shared bathroom with another person. Utilities are included on this and basic needs.
Around the area is peaceful and quiet. The address is close by at many stores. We require 1 month advance and 1 month deposit.
i need a 2 bedroom apt. or home to rent for about 2 months in the city of lakeport, while my home is being remodeled. i have two small dogs that are house broken and are great dogs! my home had some water damage from a broken pipe!
non smoker, no drugs! great reference!!!! very clean person!We are retired, very responsible and exceptionally clean. We have our criminal history, credit report, excellent references. WE NEED a 2 or 3bdrm House or Duplex or Townhouse in Klamath Falls. We have a 12lb dog, very well-mannered and house trained. Long Term Rental needed while we have a house built and purchase a lot.
We are currently in a position where we have to leave the rental we are in now. We have 4 cats and in the backyard we keep a small coop with 4 chickens and 1 rooster who we love and consider them all part of the family. With how hard it’s been to find a place in southern Oregon we are worried we might have to find a home for the animals. Just the thought of this breaks our hearts. We have lived in our current place for 3 years and pay rent on time every month. Please email me if you have anything available.

title: Gorgeous Space free 2bd 2ba
description: This gorgeous three story 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom Francisville townhome includes parking for up to 2 cars, 1650 sqft of living space and 1200 sqft of lawn plus 3 outdoor spaces! Enter the open concept living room/dining room with hardwood floors, crown molding and baseboard trim and walk back to the spacious kitchen. With gorgeous cherry cabinetry, granite counters and breakfast bar, modern black refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, gas range/oven and garbage disposal. Walk out to enjoy your large, private back yard that goes all the way through to Opal Street, where there is 1 car parking, plus room to pull another car in through the back gate if desired. Cooking out is easy with the provided grill and picnic table. On the second floor is the first bedroom and full bathroom. With a custom-built queen size murphy bed, large closets and plenty of storage. Off the hall is also the first deck, perfect for lounging, as well as a full bathroom with tub/shower combination. On the third floor is the master bedroom with huge walk-in closet, crown molding, and en-suite full bathroom with large tiled shower and double vanity. A second deck off the back of this floor includes spiral stairs to the full roof top deck. With the privacy afforded by no adjoining decks and an amazing Center City skyline view, this is the perfect place to watch the fireworks on the provided 7-piece furniture set. Walking downstairs there is a fully finished basement with new Berber carpets and recessed lighting, plus a mounted flat screen tv with sound bar, and laundry room with full size washer and dryer. With one-zone C/A and multiple thermostats, central heat, ceiling fans in the bedrooms, and an included alarm monitoring service, this home has it all! *Cats and dogs permitted

Incredibly well proportioned 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apt with office den bids a functional living experience with a comfortable blend of modern conveniences and historic elegance. title: Refreshing Bella Vista 3 bed 2 bath gem townhome with garage!
description:
705 Pemberton Street unit 711R – Available Now – 3 Bed 2 bath townhome with Garage
Amazing Bella Vista Location!! This three Bedroom, Two Full Baths Home with Garage Parking is available for rent.
Located in the Carriage Mews Condo Development this 1990 built townhome is tucked away off of Pemberton Street. Enter through the private gates into a serene shared courtyard with mature plantings including Japanese Maple trees and hostas. The first floor has a living room with a wood burning fireplace, beautiful wood parquet flooring, a mechanical/storage closet , a custom floor to ceiling bookcase, and french doors that look onto the garden courtyard. There is a very large eat in kitchen with a gas stove, a custom artisan tile backsplash, tons of countertop space and storage, a terra cotta tile floor, and a durable Corian countertop. Finally, there is a deep hall closet for storage that was a half bath prior. On the second floor, the study has a wood burning fireplace, shelving, oak hardwood flooring, and large windows allowing natural light to pour in. Also, there is a hallway full bath with additional storage space, and a washer and dryer
and a generous sized bedroom as well. The third floor includes a second bedroom, a full hallway bath with a skylight, and a small third bedroom with sliders leading to the East facing deck overlooking the tree tops and note there is the ability to add a roof deck also.
The garage is located directly to the right of the entrance gate and has some storage space as well.
The home is located in the Meredith catchment, a National Blue Ribbon school, and is a half a block down from Cianfrani Park, a neighborhood gem. Fantastic restaurants like Fiorella, Bistro La Minette, and Kalaya Thai Kitchen just a few blocks away as well as close proximity to the highways.
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers

A 5-ton bridge crane is also available on site. Building eave height is 15’. 3-Phase electricity is on site. All the improvements are located on approximately 1.9737 acres. Base Rent $13,000/month. Tenant is responsible for taxes, insurance, and maintenance. A minimum 5-year lease is required. Please DO NOT DISTURB present tenant. Property will be available soon. Please respond to this ad with YOUR NAME and PHONE NUMBER and a VALID EMAIL ADDRESS and I will call you back to schedule a showing! OR call me at
. If no answer, please leave a message with your name, phone number, and the property you are calling about.
My name is Mark and I work with Cost Segregation for commercial building owners. This creates significant tax savings by accelerating depreciation. Most owners will see around 6-10% of the building cost in extra cash flow through this reduction in taxes. For example, a $1mm cost basis will create $60K-$90K through this application. We always do a free analysis so that owners can review it with their CPAs, partners, etc. I would be glad to provide more detail if needed.
Thanks
Mark

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with City View on Rittenhouse Square
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, and Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones or a babka from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio

* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with beautiful lobby
* 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance
* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 10th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large north-facing windows
* City skyline view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
